categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: SG-1984 was a Senate Commando, an elite soldier of the Senate Guard, who served the Galactic Republic during the Clone Wars. The commando was attached to the security force that accompanied Supreme Chancellor Sheev Palpatine to his home planet of Naboo for the Festival of Light. As the Naboo celebrated the anniversary of their union with the Republic, SG-1984 was approached by Derrown, a Parwan bounty hunter disguised as a Senate Commando. The holographic facade deceived SG-1984, who continued to patrol the area while Derrown carried out his part in the Separatist conspiracy to abduct the chancellor.
